title: You have been disconnected from chat & Icon and online status and message not showing

embed.description: Note: This issue was resolved - if you continue to experience this issue, please contact support for assistance. Hey everyone, We're aware of an issue with patch 7.12 that results in this error showing. This will only happen if you relaunch the League Client while already in a game.

body: ** I followed the guide on how to fix the login issue ( Link above ) but when I did I couldn't see my chat and icon how to fix i need an answer asap**
